logic.state

Class StateAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • communication.CommunicationAdapter
      • logic.state.StateAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Multicast, TCP, UDP, StateInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WaitAnswer, WaitAuthentication, WaitRequest

    public abstract class StateAdapter
extends CommunicationAdapter
implements StateInterface
    State adapter, so classes (states), who extends from the state machine, don't have to implement every method. Created by OmniBox on 01-11-2014.

      • getClient

        public Client getClient()

      • defineAuthentication

        public StateInterface defineAuthentication(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
                                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                           java.io.IOException,
                                           java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: StateInterface
        Define Authentication. Receives username and password for authentication purpose. If data inserted is not valid, state should remain WaitAuthentication, if its valid, then state should move to WaitRequest. Exception should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.
        Specified by:
        defineAuthentication in interface StateInterface
        Parameters:
        username - username
        password - password
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • defineGetRequest

        public StateInterface defineGetRequest(OmniFile fileToGet)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: StateInterface
        Define Get Request. Receives desired OmniFile to get. It should return state WaitAnswer if there are no errors and if your waiting for an answer from the other end. If not, then return WaitRequest. Exceptions should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.
        Specified by:
        defineGetRequest in interface StateInterface
        Parameters:
        fileToGet - file to get
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • defineMulticastRequest

        public StateInterface defineMulticastRequest()
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: StateInterface
        Define Multicast Request. Responsible for handling multicast connection if implemented. Exception should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.
        Specified by:
        defineMulticastRequest in interface StateInterface
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendMulticastMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMulticastMessage(java.lang.String messageToSend)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Multicast
        This method sends the only available muticast message and waits for response. Returns the reponse as a String object.
